results.name: Array of prime powers p^j, as transpose of A182944.
comment: The monotonic ordering of this sequence, with 1 prefixed, is A000961.
The joint-rank array of this sequence is A182869.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (MAGMA) [NthPrime(n-i)^i: i in [1..n-1], n in [2..15]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 28 2015
xref: A319075 extends the array with 0th powers.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 14 2010
